TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug used to treat bacterial infections. It is a type of fluoroquinolone. Also called Avelox and moxifloxacin.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "hidrocloruro de moxifloxacino"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que se usa para tratar infecciones bacterianas. Es un tipo de fluoroquinolona. Tambi√©n se llama Avelox y moxifloxacino.
